Annexure 2 :  Blood Pressure Measurement
Steps
1. Select the type of blood pressure instrument.
2. Check that the bulb is properly attached to the tubing and there are no cracks or leakage.
3. Ask the person to sit on a chair or lie down on her left side or slightly tilt to the left on a flat surface.
